item.title: 特朗普获胜令欧洲投资者雪上加霜
item.description:
自美国大选以来，欧洲股市和欧元全线下滑，因为投资者押注特朗普的政策将重创欧洲大陆。【原文：

European stocks and the euro have all slumped since the US election as investors bet Trump’s policies will hit the continent hard.

】

item.title: Talabat 15 亿美元迪拜首次公开募股开盘后不久即告售罄
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 的中东业务部门在迪拜首次公开发行的 15 亿美元股票在认购开始后几分钟就被抢购一空，这是地区性交易需求旺盛的最新迹象。【原文：Delivery Hero SE’s Middle East unit had demand for all shares in its $1.5 billion Dubai initial public offering minutes after subscriptions opened, in the latest sign of robust demand for regional deals.】

item.title: 随着紧张局势缓和，中国寻求恢复与印度的直飞航班
item.description: 中国外交部长王毅表示，中国希望恢复与印度的直航，因为这两个亚洲邻国之间的紧张局势在长达四年的边界争端僵局之后有所缓和。【原文：Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said the country wants to restore direct flights with India, as tensions between the two Asian neighbors dial down following a four-year impasse on border disputes.】

item.title: 当您在投票时，美国公司赚了大钱
item.description:
财报季显示，第三季度业绩并未因大选前的紧张情绪而放缓。【原文：

Earnings season shows that third-quarter performance didn’t slow down on pre-election jitters.

】

item.title: 中国要求地方基金停止通过香港联系购买 LGFV 债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国实际上已禁止国内投资者通过与香港的交易联系购买地方政府融资工具发行的离岸人民币债券，这是中国为控制债务缠身的地方政府融资工具风险而采取的最新举措。【原文：China has effectively banned domestic investors from buying offshore yuan bonds issued by local government financing vehicles through its trading link with Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, in the latest move to contain risks from the debt-laden sector.】

item.title: 人工智能伴侣时代的爱情
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Posthuman的这一集中，我们将探讨机器人是否有助于缓解孤独感的流行—或使其更加严重。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Posthuman, we explore whether bots will help ease the loneliness epidemic—or make it worse.

】

item.title: 瑞典 4000 亿美元养老金调整威胁小型基金
item.description: 瑞典规模较小的资产管理公司面临着达尔文式的生存斗争，因为在瑞典 4000 亿美元的养老金行业发生欺诈丑闻后，瑞典进行了重大改革，削减了储蓄者可选择的基金数量。【原文：Sweden’s smaller asset managers face a Darwinian struggle for survival as major reforms slash the number of funds that savers can choose after a fraud scandal rocked the country’s $400 billion pension industry.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，非洲各国央行将趁机削减开支
item.description: 在未来三周内权衡利弊的大多数非洲国家央行都将降低利率，因为他们担心唐纳德-特朗普就任美国总统后，进一步放宽利率的窗口可能会缩小。【原文：Most African central banks weighing interest rates over the next three weeks are set to lower them, wary that the window to ease further may narrow after Donald Trump becomes US president.】

item.title: 匈牙利将维持关键利率，重点放在指导上：决策指南
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选引发新兴市场货币最大幅度下跌之后，匈牙利准备连续第二个月维持关键利率不变，以支持福林。【原文：Hungary is poised to hold its key interest rate for a second month to support the forint after Donald Trump’s election win triggered one of the steepest currency declines in emerging markets.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，越南纺织集团寻求市场多元化
item.description: 越南服装业明年将继续增长，但在等待美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普在关税问题上采取何种措施的同时，越南正寻求使其主要出口市场多样化。【原文：Vietnam’s garment industry is set for continued growth next year but is looking to diversify its key export markets as it waits to see what steps US President-elect Donald Trump will take when it comes to tariffs.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利和高盛呼吁提高大中华区透明度
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的高层呼吁中国提高透明度，放宽资本流动，以恢复全球投资者的胃口。【原文：The top bosses from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley called for greater transparency from China and for eased movement of capital to restore the appetite of global investors.】

item.title: 牛肉饭价格上涨带动日本 Zensho 公司股价上涨
item.description: 日本快餐店运营商 Zensho Holdings Co. 的股价因其计划提高牛肉饭连锁店 Sukiya 的价格而跳涨。摩根士丹利 MUFG 证券公司（Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co.【原文：Shares of Japanese fast-food restaurant operator Zensho Holdings Co. jumped on its plans to raise prices at beef bowl chain Sukiya. A target price increase by Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. also helped boost the stock.】

item.title: BCG称尽管实施经济刺激政策，中国消费者仍持谨慎态度
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）表示，由于政府近期采取的刺激措施尚未对中国消费者动摇的信心产生实质性的提振作用，中国消费者在消费方面仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Chinese consumers remain cautious on spending as the government’s recent stimulus measures haven’t yet yielded a substantive boost to their shaken confidence, Boston Consulting Group said.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后菲律宾央行释放宽松信号
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）周二表示，尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的胜选给全球经济和政策利率路径带来了不确定性，但菲律宾央行仍将继续降息。【原文：The Philippine central bank is on course for more rate cuts, Governor Eli Remolona said Tuesday, even as Donald Trump’s win has cast uncertainty over the global economy and policy rate path.】

item.title: 韩国上季度家庭债务增幅为 2021 年以来最大
item.description: 韩国上一季度的家庭债务增长为三年来之最，这突显了央行直到上个月才开始调整政策的一个事态发展。【原文：South Korea’s household debt grew the most in three years last quarter, highlighting a development that kept the central bank from pivoting on policy until last month.】

item.title: 日本和中国在特朗普赢得大选前抛售美国国债
item.description: 随着美国总统大选前的反弹，全球最大的两家美国国债外国持有者在第三季度抛售了大量国债。【原文：Two of the world’s biggest foreign holders of US government debt offloaded a pile of Treasuries in the third quarter as they rallied before the presidential election.】

item.title: 马哈拉施特拉邦民调接近尾声，熊市包围莫迪股票
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国决策者承诺继续推进金融开放
item.description: 在香港举行的一次重要会议上，中国的政策制定者和最高监管机构首次与全球金融界名人公开亮相，誓言继续向外国投资者和企业开放。【原文：China’s policymakers and top regulators vowed to continue its opening up to foreign investors and firms, in their first public appearances with global financial luminaries at a major conference in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 什么是 "韩国折扣"，为什么它是个问题？
item.description: 全球投资者都在关注韩国能否使公司董事会对股东更加负责。韩国股票的交易估值往往低于海外同行，分析人士认为，公司治理不善是所谓的 "韩国折扣 "背后的一个因素。韩国总统尹锡烈将解决这一问题作为首要任务，因为他希望赢得越来越多散户投资者的青睐。他并不是第一个尝试的领导人，他需要克服强大的商业利益。【原文：Global investors are watching if South Korea can make company boards more accountable to stockholders. Shares in the country tend to trade at lower valuations than their peers overseas, with analysts saying poor corporate governance is one factor behind what is known as the “Korea Discount.” President Yoon Suk Yeol has made fixing it a priority as he seeks to win favor with a growing base of retail investors. He’s not the first leader to try, and he’ll need to overcome powerful business interest】

item.title: WeWork 放弃新加坡网点，显示联合办公面临困境
item.description: WeWork 公司正在放弃新加坡两个黄金地段的办公空间，这凸显了该公司在其最具潜力的市场之一所面临的挑战。【原文：WeWork Inc. is giving up space in two prime locations in Singapore, underscoring the company’s challenges in one of its most promising markets.】

item.title: 全球资金在印度一级市场的购买量创历史新高
item.description: 自 10 月份以来，外国投资者从印度股票中撤出的资金创下了历史新高，他们纷纷涌入首次公开募股市场，以寻求更好的回报。【原文：Foreign investors are pulling record sums from Indian shares since October and piling into initial public offerings in search for better returns.】

item.title: 据说 Blackstone 接近达成三明治连锁店 Jersey Mike's 的交易
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone 公司即将达成协议，以约 80 亿美元（包括债务）收购三明治连锁店 Jersey Mike's。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is close to an agreement to acquire sandwich chain Jersey Mike’s for about $8 billion including debt, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 引领中国股市史诗般反弹的富达基金重新买入股票
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）的乔治-埃夫斯塔索普洛斯（George Efstathopoulos）在 9 月底成功把握住中国股市史诗般的涨势后，再次加仓，因为他预期财政刺激政策将支撑经济。【原文：After successfully riding China’s epic stock rally in late September, Fidelity International’s George Efstathopoulos is boosting positions again on expectations that fiscal stimulus will prop up the economy.】

item.title: 苹果出价 1 亿美元撤销印尼 iPhone 16 禁令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司已将其在印尼的投资报价提高了近十倍，这是这家美国科技巨头说服印尼政府取消 iPhone 16 销售禁令的最新举措。【原文：Apple Inc. has increased its offer to invest in Indonesia by almost tenfold, according to people familiar with the matter, in the US tech giant’s latest bid to persuade the government to lift its sales ban on the iPhone 16.】

item.title: 高盛的科斯汀预计 2025 年底 S&P 500 指数将达到 6500 点
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The S&P 500 Index will rise through the end of next year amid continued US economic expansion and earnings growth, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s chief equity strategist David Kostin.】

item.title: 中国最炙手可热的电动汽车股--新朋股份在跑赢 93% 后面临盈利考验
item.description: 虽然特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）占据了头条新闻，但随着投资者对其产品战略的迅速追捧，新鹏公司（Xpeng Inc.【原文：While Tesla Inc. is grabbing the headlines, Xpeng Inc. has been the hottest electric vehicle stock over the past few months as investors rapidly warm to its product strategy.】

item.title: 美国日益拥抱加密货币，比特币再获助力
item.description: 比特币又回到了历史峰值附近，这主要得益于美国在加密货币啦啦队长唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的带领下，对数字资产行业的支持不断加深。【原文：Bitcoin is back in the vicinity of an all-time peak, supported by a salvo of developments highlighting the deepening embrace of the digital-asset industry in the US under crypto cheerleader Donald Trump.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为现金利率适当，并讨论了政策情景
item.description: 澳大利亚央行认为其目前的政策设置是适当的，可以努力降低仍然 "过高 "的核心通胀率，同时在两周前的会议上讨论了可能需要降息、加息或在更长时间内维持较高利率的情况。【原文：Australia’s central bank sees its current policy settings as appropriate to try to pull down core inflation that is still “too high,” while discussing at its meeting two weeks ago scenarios that might require an interest-rate cut, hike or for them to stay higher for longer.】

item.title: 欧洲人工智能初创企业获得的资金达 110 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲人工智能初创企业的融资额虽然还不到美国的四分之一，但由于对构建聊天机器人和自动驾驶汽车的新公司进行了大量投资，今年创下了历史新高。【原文：Funding for European artificial intelligence startups, while still less than a quarter of US figures, hit a record high this year thanks to massive investments in newcomers building chatbots and self-driving cars.】

item.title: HPE 与司法部高层领导会面，以挽救 140 亿美元的瞻博网络交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，惠普企业公司和瞻博网络公司的代表上周会见了司法部的反垄断执法人员，为说服该机构不要质疑他们提出的 140 亿美元交易做最后的努力。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co. and Juniper Networks Inc. representatives met with Justice Department antitrust enforcers last week in a final effort to persuade the agency not to challenge their proposed $14 billion deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】
